Description:
Solid Brick Veneer - Priced to Sell
This spacious three bedroom house is sited on a generous 748 square metre block in a convenient location, only a short walk to schools, medical facilities and the township.
The generous kitchen/ meals area has been renovated with a stainless steel wall oven, gas cook top, tiled floor and a sliding door opening to the good sized under cover patio/BBQ area.
The home offers a separate lounge, generous bedrooms all with built-in-robes, and a renovated bathroom. Throughout the home is ducted gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling; lock up garage under roofline. Secure well fenced yard with a brick lock up shed.
A good solid home, only needing a cosmetic tweak, and a great opportunity for a first home buyer/ investor. Enquire today!

Description:
Appealing & Low Maintenance
Sited on an easy-to-manage 516 square metre block in the popular Rivertown Estate, this stylish three bedroom home is low maintenance and would ideally suit retirees, young couples or investors.
Features open plan kitchen/meals/living area - fully tiled with an island bench and wall oven. Carpeted bedrooms, the main of which has a walk-in robe and ensuite, and the second and third bedrooms both have built-in robes. Ducted heating and cooling throughout. Large double garage plus vehicle access to the side yard. Generous undercover outdoor entertaining area, outdoor kitchen with a built-in barbecue and sink, plus a fire/cooking pit - perfect for entertaining guests. Landscaped surrounds with an impressive built-in veggie patch, fruit trees, and a garden shed.
Call today to arrange your inspection.

Description:
Expansive Family Home In Superb Location
Positioned on a large 1197 square metre elevated block, in a quiet court and only a short stroll to the banks of the Murray River.
A quality built home ideal for any growing family. Features a tiled open plan living with appealing timber kitchen with a wall oven, ample storage and cupboard space. This area includes sliding doors in which open to the lovely outdoor area.
This property features ducted gas heating/cooling and reverse cycle split system air conditioning, a second living area, four generous bedrooms; the main bedroom also has a walk in robe and ensuite.
This house has direct access from the double garage, 3 kilo watt solar, 66c buy back. The yard provides easy vehicle/ caravan access and includes a 5.5m x 5.5m shed with a concrete floor and power.
A quality property in a highly sought after location, and a must to inspect!

Description:
Rare 46 Acre Property Close To Town
Fantastic 18.36 hectare property (46 acres) in a choice Cobram location, only 1km (approx.) from town. Plenty of room to build your dream home (subject to council approval) on a very versatile block with infrastructure in place.
~ Four spear points with ground licence.
~ MW connection project complete with channel access.
~ Soft start pump with flood irrigation option or a centre main feed in place.
~ 24m x 12m Telford shed with concrete floor and 400 half bin cool room in place.
~ 14m x 12m lock up machinery shed.
~ Bore with stock & domestic and ground licences.
This is a rare opportunity, don't overlook the value here. Inspect today!

Description:
The Aspects! The Location! The Design!
Elevated excellence and a must to inspect. Positioned on a generous elevated 875 square metre block in at the top of Tilton Court, this stunning family home residence offers luxury living inside and out.
The large open plan living area has a feature stone fireplace, well appointed kitchen with butler's pantry and ample cupboard space, and sliding stacker doors opening to the beautiful alfresco living area, making this combined area perfect for large family gatherings. The alfresco area also features a stone open fireplace, ceiling fan and track blinds - suitable for year round enjoyment. Spacious second living area, four generous bedrooms and fully equipped study/office. Appealing bathroom, ensuite with large shower recess, ducted zoned reverse cycle air conditioning, zoned in-floor heating, 9 foot ceilings and tinted windows.
Sparkling in-ground pool and an outdoor toilet & shower. The large double garage has twin auto-doors and direct house access, plus a third garage ideal for golf buggies, toys, etc. Lovely landscaped, easy-care surrounds. Garden shed, veggie patch and 7.4 kilowatt solar electricity system. Prime river-end location, only a short walk from the Murray River and walking tracks. Must inspect to appreciate all that this property has to offer.

Description:
More than meets the eye
This stunning 23sq federation style residence occupies a magnificent lush garden allotment of 1110sqm and is deceptive as to what is on offer from the street! The stylish craftsmanship throughout this airy and light filled home becomes apparent the moment you enter the foyer with its stained glass, indulging 9ft ceilings and timber floors which extend throughout the home. The formal living area offers seamless views of the front garden and is set in a large bay projection. To the rear of the home, the Baltic pine kitchen becomes the centrepiece and overlooks both separate meals and family areas. It offers an abundance of cupboard and bench space with gas cooktop, wall oven tower, step in pantry and dishwasher. The oversized master bedroom has an ensuite which has recently been renovated with oversized shower, vanity and toilet and separate walk in robe. The remaining three bedrooms are also generous in size with built in robes. Tucked away adjacent the family room is a study nook area complete with built in cabinetry. The family bathroom has separate toilet, shower, large vanity and bath. Even the laundry is spacious with ample bench and cupboard space making it ideal for those who love crafts and sewing. Externally is where the real magic happens with an outdoor entertaining area which wraps around two sides of the home with built in pizza oven and its own toilet and powder room facilities, making it ideal for those who just love to entertain. On those chilly nights you can then move into the shed that has an open fire place and the ability to open the shed up or close it off from the elements when required. If it's a shed you are looking for, then you can't go past this one, which is a total of approximately 140sqm in size and offers various areas including workshop, storage area and a place to park up to 4-5 vehicles, boat or caravan. The garden has been meticulously designed and truly compliments the home and has a raised cubby house with storage under, raised vegetable garden area and chook pen. Other features include solar electricity, security system, surround sound, in-ground sprinklers throughout and domestic bore. All in all, this is just a stunning and magnificent property and guaranteed to please the most discerning buyer.

Description:
Retirement Living
Located in Cobram Oasis Retirement Village this one bedroom home has a dual end carport/ outdoor area. This unit is positioned on a large block, providing ample room for a boat or caravan beside the home.
Featuring a garden shed, split system air conditioner, reverse cycle split system heating, fernery area and electric hot water system. Situated close to the front of the park;
Oasis Village has it all for relaxed retirement living! Tennis court, swimming pool opposite, community centre, parks, lake, and caravan parking is also available. Enjoy the retirement village lifestyle at a very affordable price. Inspect today!

Address: Lot 2 Cnr Manse & Sims Road Cobram VIC 3644
Description:
7 Acre Lifestyle Block With Subdivision Potential (STCA)
Create your dream home on this unique 7 acres vacant block.
Situated within the town boundary and in residential zoning, it fronts the State Forest which adjoins the Might Murray River. Ideally suited to those wanting a fantastic spacious home site, or to subdivide (subject to council approval) or both! It certainly is a blank canvas, with power, town water and sewerage all available, as well as a large shed.
Peace and quiet surrounded by the bush. Walk to the river or the Thompson's Beach.

The perfect block to build your dream home and enjoy the superb lifestyle this unique location has to offer.

Description:
Light filled renovated home
Located only minutes walk from the CBD is a freshly renovated three bedroom family home. Upon arrival the lounge is light filled and offers gas heating and reverse cycle split system and opens onto a separate meals area and fully renovated kitchen. The kitchen has an abundance of cupboard space and electric stove and overlooks the sensational decked outdoor entertaining area. All three bedrooms are generous in size with two offering built in robes. The family bathroom has separate shower, bath and timber vanity. Externally there is a fantastic sized rear yard with access from the rear lane, two good sized colorbond sheds and a carport with roller door to the front and almost fully enclosed. The front of the property has recently been landscaped making this home look very contemporary for its age! Must be inspected to appreciate what is on offer, don't miss out!

Private Unit - Walk to Town
Hard-to-find two bedroom unit in a private lane way in a great central location, only short walking distance to town. This neat stand-alone unit has an excellent open living area with reverse cycle split system air conditioning/heating, and two generous bedrooms with built-in robes. Single lockup garage with roller door access, extra off street parking space, and a good sized, low maintenance back yard area with lawn. Great opportunity for an investment or low-maintenance living. Call today.

Description:
Luxury Family Living In Premier Location
Craftsman Built four bedroom residence, located in highly sought after View Court on a 1162 square metre block.
Beautifully appointed throughout and boasts stunning open kitchen/ meals/ living area, with 900mm stainless steel oven. The home features a lovely outlook to the sparkling in-ground pool positioned outside of the kitchen and living area. Has a separate family area, lounge, formal dining area, a well equipped study and laundry.
Within the house features a large main bedroom with a walk-in-robe, ensuite with two vanities and a separate toilet. Ducted gas heating, evaporative cooling, polished jarrah timber floors, and direct house access from the double garage.
This property has a large outdoor entertaining deck and beautifully established surrounds, offering privacy in the backyard. Sited near the Murray River this top quality home is only a short stroll to the bush and a must to inspect.

Description:
SURE TO IMPRESS
This well presented 3 BR family home has loads to offer. All bedrooms have BIRs, ceiling fans & the master has r/cycle air con, a fully renovated, modern kitchen with electric appliances & dishwasher.
A spacious lounge with timber look floors adjoining the dining area with split system & gas heater.
Neutral coloured tiles, freshly painted throughout & plenty of storage cupboards.
Outside a large undercover entertaining area with slate tiles. A carport with drive through access to the backyard with garden shed and ample yard space.
On an approx 800m2 block in a quiet street walking distance to the school, sporting facilities & shops.
MOTIVATED VENDORS !!
